msg.msgText:
A "DestinationMappingRule" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update DestinationMappingRule help imaserver update DestinationMappingRule "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update DestinationMappingRule "Name=DestMapRule1" "RuleType=3"
Configuration items for "DestinationMappingRule" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
